name: Dove Care by Nature douchegel restoring
composition: INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Carbomer, Lauric Acid, Glycol Distearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Glycinate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Isethionate, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Palmitic Acid, PPG-6, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Cocamide, Sodium Gluconate, Citric Acid, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Caprylic Acid, Hydroxystearic Acid, Hydrogenated Vegetable Glycerides, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Seed Extract, Sodium Methyl Lauroyl Taurate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Coumarin, CI 17200, CI 19140, CI 42090.
